title: General
stimulusHtml:
3 point(s) maximum

Construction/Circle (2 points)

• Correct placement of organisms on the tree: zebrafish, frog, finch, turtle, gecko (from top to bottom; turtle and gecko can be reversed)

• Circle the node that appears furthest to the right

Justification (1 point)

• The zebrafish has the greatest number of differences (in neuromodulin sequence) compared to the other organisms
descriptions:
Student response earns 0 of the following 3 points

3 point(s) maximum

Construction/Circle (2 points)

• Correct placement of organisms on the tree: zebrafish, frog, finch, turtle, gecko (from top to bottom; turtle and gecko can be reversed)

• Circle the node that appears furthest to the right

Justification (1 point)

• The zebrafish has the greatest number of differences (in neuromodulin sequence) compared to the other organisms

Student response earns 1 of the following 3 points

3 point(s) maximum

• Correct placement of organisms on the tree: zebrafish, frog, finch, turtle, gecko (from top to bottom; turtle and gecko can be reversed)

• Circle the node that appears furthest to the right

• The zebrafish has the greatest number of differences (in neuromodulin sequence) compared to the other organisms

Student response earns 2 of the following 3 points

Student response earns 3 of the following 3 points
